si.title: බුද්ධිය යනු ද?
body_lines: "එක්සත් ජනපදය ශ්රී ලංකාවේ ආරක්ෂිතව සිටීම ගැන වැඩි සැලකිල්ලක් දක්වයි. ஏனென்றால் திறந்த வெளிப்படையான இந்தோ - பசுபிக் என்ற அமெரிக்காவின் மூலோபாயத்தில் முக்கியமான பங்காளியாக இலங்கையை வைத்திருக்க விரும்புகிறது”

en.title: Is the intelligence wrong?
body_lines: “The United States is more concerned about being safe in Sri Lanka. This is because open transparent Indo -Pacific wants Sri Lanka as an important partner in the strategy of the United States. ”

summary_lines: US prioritizes safety in Sri Lanka due to strategic importance in Indo-Pacific region. Transparency and partnership sought with Sri Lanka.
